name: Tetrix (Arakiel Games)
description:
Tetrix v.1.0 - 

Play Tetrix. Blocks of different

kind and colors are coming down,

order them in a straight row.

Level up and achieve a good Score.

Nice Sounds and 2 Player Mode.

Good graphics and atmosphere in 2d.

Runs on different Systems in your

Browser. This program is Shareware.
